domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Going Out
entity.description: This entity tracks all conversations about going out.

text: Tower thread - The fact people are going out to crowded public areas (bars for the most part) is mind boggling. Yes younger people (under 55/60) are mildly effected for the most part (unless you have a preexisting illness). But any age is still just as contagious as the next.
